Class Door

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Component
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Door
All Implemented Interfaces:
Figure, Visitable, Serializable
public class Door extends Component
Represents a door in the robot simulation. A door can be opened or closed and is associated with a parent Room.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Door

      public Door(int x, int y, int size, Room parentRoom) throws InvalidComponentPlacementException
      Constructs a Door with specified position, size, and parent Room.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the door's position.
      y - Y-coordinate of the door's position.
      size - Size of the door.
      parentRoom - The Room to which the door belongs.
      Throws:
      InvalidComponentPlacementException - If the door's position is not on the room's border.

  • Method Details

    • getParentRoom

      public final Room getParentRoom()
      Gets the parent Room of the door.
      Returns:
      The parent Room of the door.

    • isOpen

      public final boolean isOpen()
      Checks if the door is open.
      Returns:
      True if the door is open, false otherwise.

    • open

      public final void open()
      Opens the door and updates its style.

    • close

      public final void close()
      Closes the door and updates its style.

    • fitsInDoor

      public boolean fitsInDoor(int x, int y)
      Checks if a point at (x, y) fits in the door (i.e., is within the door's open area).
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the point
      y - the y-coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point fits in the open door

    • fitsInDoor

      public boolean fitsInDoor(int x, int y, int size)
      Checks if a square centered at (x, y) with side length `size` fits entirely in the door.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the square's center
      y - the y-coordinate of the square's center
      size - the size of the square's side
      Returns:
      true if the square fits entirely within the open door

    • fitsInDoor

      public boolean fitsInDoor(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Checks if a rectangle centered at (x, y) with given width and height fits in the door.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the rectangle's center
      y - the y-coordinate of the rectangle's center
      width - the width of the rectangle
      height - the height of the rectangle
      Returns:
      true if the rectangle fits entirely within the open door
